children.name: Program.cs

Dockerfile
children.code:
# build
FROM mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:8.0 AS build
WORKDIR /src
COPY ./ ../
WORKDIR /src/backend/HelioPay.API
RUN dotnet publish HelioPay.API.csproj -c Release -o /app

# run
FROM mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:8.0
WORKDIR /app
COPY --from=build /app ./
ENV ASPNETCORE_URLS=http://0.0.0.0:${PORT}
CMD ["bash","-lc","dotnet HelioPay.API.dll --urls http://0.0.0.0:$PORT"]
